mapper.select: select gt.type_id,gt.type_name,gt.type_status from goods_type as gt,operator_goodstype as og where gt.type_id=og.type_id and og.operator_id = #{operator_id} and gt.type_status = "active"

select type_id,type_name,type_status from goods_type LEFT JOIN (select goods_type.type_id as i,operator_goodstype.operator_id from goods_type left join operator_goodstype on goods_type.type_id=operator_goodstype.type_id where operator_id = #{operator_id} and type_status = "active") as t2 on goods_type.type_id = t2.i where t2.operator_id is null and goods_type.type_status = "active"
mapper.delete: delete from operator_goodstype where operator_id=#{operator_id} and type_id=#{type_id}
